name: TORONTO FOOD CRAWL.  LIKE A PUB CRAWL BUT FOR FOOD
description: Many of life's greatest moments are shared around the dinner table.  The best stories, the greatest laughs, and of course, the unforgettable meal.  What a better way to discover a new city, and connect with other exploring travelers than through those unforgettable meals.  This Toronto Food Crawl sets itself apart from ordinary tours by familiarizing you with Toronto through the indelible cuisine it has to offer.  It unites us through the most social aspect of our lives: food.  You may not always remember what you discovered in a new city, but you'll always remember what you ate and who you shared it with.  Eat your way through Toronto with me at some of my favourite restaurants, I will take the guess work out for you, I will show you where and what to eat.
